Revelation of Battle.name: Revelation of Battle
Revelation of Battle.flavor: A ringing impact from your favored weapon instructs your allies in the more direct matters of faith.
Revelation of Battle.effect: Each ally within 10 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

Battle Hymn.name: Battle Hymn
Battle Hymn.flavor: You raise your voice in song, and your companions carry its power into battle.
Battle Hymn.target: You and each ally in the burst
Battle Hymn.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target deals 1d8 extra damage when making a melee basic attack as part of a charge.

Deny Defeat.attack: Strength vs. AC. You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll for each dying ally within your line of sight.
Deny Defeat.effect: Each dying ally within your line of sight can spend a healing surge.
